structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

text.section: There is established in the State Treasury a revolving fund for the use by the board.

All fees and other money received by the board in accordance with KRS 198B.706, 198B.712, 198B.714, 198B.722, and 198B.724 shall be deposited in the revolving fund established in subsection (1) of this section.
No part of this revolving fund shall revert to the general fund.
The compensation of board members and all of the board's expenses incurred by the board shall be paid from this revolving fund.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 7, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 6, effective July 13, 2004.
